data.title: The Works and Correspondence of David Ricardo, Vol. 10 Biographical Miscellany
data.meta_description: This volume is a collection of personal correspondence and recollections that focus on Ricardo’s life outside of his political economic endeavors. These missives concern Ricardo’s character, his amiable and generous nature, his successful business dealings, and his personal relationships. There are chapters on his entrance into the stock market as a mere teenager and records of his meteoric climb within the financial community to an extremely successful station.
data.text:
Maurice Herbert Dobb (editor)

Piero Sraffa (editor)

David Ricardo (author)

This volume is a collection of personal correspondence and recollections that focus on Ricardo’s life outside of his political economic endeavors. These missives concern Ricardo’s character, his amiable and generous nature, his successful business dealings, and his personal relationships. There are chapters on his entrance into the stock market as a mere teenager and records of his meteoric climb within the financial community to an extremely successful station.

Buy this Book
